text: <@UDEASNWEB>  I'd be interested in seeing that too :slightly_smiling_face:

Thanks! I found this yesterday after a bit of hunting and after more hunting/experimentation I managed to get what I needed.
that’s my code file (with a lot of commented-out trial and error), a screenshot of the chatflow setup within HS, and a readme explaining the issues i’m running into

I'm authenticating my Oauth2 app with my account and getting an error instead of a checkbox during permission confirmation :x: :disappointed: Can I get some help?
error in image is: `[missing "en.oauth.authorization.recaptcha.connectionError_jsx" translation]`
I also see a timeout in the javascript console: `Failed to load resource: net::ERR_CONNECTION_TIMED_OUT   <https://www.gstatic.com/recaptcha/releases/JPZ52lNx97aD96bjM7KaA0bo/recaptcha__en.js>`
Oh wow, I got it to work by turning off my VPN... that was a bit unexpected. I guess this captcha isn't compatible with <https://www.privateinternetaccess.com/|PIA VPN>.

Is there a way to create a list of contacts in HubSpot based number of site visits. E.g. all contacts that have visited our website more than XX times? I can see how to do this for number of page views, but not site visits. Thanks in advance.
